Graph VisualizationÂ¶

The graph visualization produces average value graph images for each parameter (Breed, Spread, Road, etc.) from the data produced from the calibration phase of DSLEUTH. Running py -m graph_avg_log -input inputFolder in the visualization directory will use the DSLEUTH input logs provided in inputFolder to produce graph image files in the current directory. Running py -m graph_avg_log -input avg_log_files/ will run the visualization tool on the sample logs provided in the visualization directory.
